page.title: 19ST.MICHAEL'S HARVEST SUPPER
page.content: About 90 people attend the annual Harvest Supper. The 4 course meal is prepared by members of St. Michaels congregation. After supper, guests enter church which is decorated with flowers and produce. Local singers then give a concert. The pleasant evening gives everyone the opportunity to see a local church in all its glory for its Patronal Festival, on Sept. 29th. in 1985. Over Â£300 was raised from the 1985 supper. Money is urgently needed for the repair of the church steeple. Structural damage will cost Â£7000 to put right. This has been the first major concern for the new vicar, Rev. Neil Russell, whose induction took place at St. Marys on Sept.11th 1985.
